PERSONA:
john is a 55-year-old white man living in a metropolitan area of the south, specifically in the east south central census division. he holds a college degree, potentially with some post-graduate education, and identifies himself as a protestant and a born-again or evangelical christian, although he seldom attends religious services.

despite his moderate political ideology, john aligns himself with the republican party. he is a registered voter and is absolutely certain about his registration status at his current address. john comes from an upper-income family, earning between $60,000 and $70,000 annually.

born and raised in the united states, john has never been married. he is an avid internet user, accessing it several times a day. however, he does not engage in any voluntary work or community service activities.

john takes pride in his american citizenship and his white, non-hispanic heritage. he leads a relatively comfortable life in his metropolitan surroundings, balancing his moderate political views with his religious beliefs and financial stability.
